statements: DELETE FROM emergency_shelters WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' AND capacity > 100;
DELETE FROM emergency_shelters WHERE available_resources LIKE '%food%' AND capacity < 50;
DELETE FROM shelter_contacts WHERE contact_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM shelters WHERE shelter_id = 1 AND capacity < 50;
DELETE FROM shelter_contacts WHERE contact_id = 2 AND shelter_id = 10;
DELETE FROM Resources WHERE resource_name = 'Water' AND quantity = 0;
DELETE FROM resource_inventory WHERE shelter_id = 2 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM shelter_occupancy WHERE shelter_id = 1 AND occupancy_date = '2022-01-15';
